methods.description: Return the delay segment where the flight is likely to lay.

parameters.name: originLocationCode
parameters.description: city/airport [IATA code](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) from which the traveler is departing, e.g. PAR for Paris

parameters.name: destinationLocationCode
parameters.description: city/airport [IATA code](http://www.iata.org/publications/Pages/code-search.aspx) to which the traveler is going, e.g. PAR for Paris

parameters.name: departureDate
parameters.description: the date on which the traveler will depart from the origin to go to the destination. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-12-25

parameters.name: departureTime
parameters.description: local time relative to originLocationCode on which the traveler will depart from the origin. Time respects ISO 8601 standard. e.g. 13:22:00

parameters.name: arrivalDate
parameters.description: the date on which the traveler will arrive to the destination from the origin. Dates are specified in the [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. 2019-12-25

parameters.name: arrivalTime
parameters.description: local time relative to destinationLocationCode on which the traveler will arrive to destination. Time respects ISO 8601 standard. e.g. 13:22:00

parameters.name: flightNumber
parameters.description: flight number as assigned by the carrier

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: flight duration in [ISO8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) PnYnMnDTnHnMnS format, e.g. PT2H10M

apiDescription: Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token.
